sub_title: Test Architect | QA Engineer | Test Automation | Cloud Technology Consultant in Azure | Executive MBA | Mentor
summary:
Ananda Kumar Irudhayaraj is an Innovative thinking Architect in Test and Cloud Technology consultant with proven ability in working with cloud based micro services and mono frontend's in PCF (Azure Cloud). 
- Creating Autonomous test strategies for Investment sales application.
- Working with teams on Implementing PACT Contract based test solutions. 
- Working with teams on Implementing POSTMAN collection for online could based REST & GraphQL API's.
- Working with teams on Implementing FrontEnd Automation using WDIO framework in SAUCELABS.
- Training teams on Quality solutions.
- Always eager to research new solution capabilities and tools fits to the origination. 
- Working on Azure Cloud Technology solutions like creation and managing of server less SQL DB and needed resources  Storage, Authorization, Network and Automating the process with PS scripts. 

Over all 15 years of experience in software quality engineering and assurance. In my recent 10 years of assignments are involving online banking projects where I had multi-disciplinary responsibilities like e2e test setup, continuous test process setup and automation setup involved with latest web technologies (i.e. Angular JS, JAVA) built as mono and micro service applications. Earlier in career about 5 years worked on various test assignments for Banks Payment systems involving HP NonStop Tandem based server technologies. 
 
Azure Architect Certified professional in handling cloud solutions.

ISTQB certified test professional. Expertise in DevOps testing, agile testing, test automation, technical test and handling enterprise applications e2e chain for banking applications.  
 
Experienced in web and device automation, Plus sound knowledge in automation tools and frameworks such as WbdriverIO, Cucumber (BDD), Protractor, Selenium, Zalando and FitNesse (Slim), POSTMAN API Automation, REST Assured, SOAPUI. Test development integration with Jenkins/DevOps Azure, developed and maintained automation regression suite. Exposer to model based automation tools like TOSCA. 

Certified Scrum Master and experienced with test management, test coordination, test strategy, test estimation, test planning and test reporting. 
 
Azure, PCF, DockerToolbox, DevOps Azure, Jenkins, GIT, SourceTree, NodeJS, SPLUNK, SM9, Perfecto Lab, Soap UI, Web Storm, IntelleJ (Java IDE),  Jira, Confluence, Oracle EM 11g, Siebel Open UI, Agile designer, Stub Management, Linux Tools , DBVisualizer.

profile_positions.title: Agile Test Lead and Senior Test Specialist via Cognizant

profile_positions.description: Worked in a project to test Loan (Angular JS + JAVA) application in a complex chain environment following Agile (Scrum) process. Responsibilities are setting up test strategy together with test manager and third parties, perform system test, integration test (SOAP UI), automate (Protractor & Cucumber)application and chain test within every two weeks of sprint. Work closely with BAi and ensure services are in line with application. Keep track on test and bugs in JIRA. End of sprint, show the result and demonstrate the application to all stakeholders and following up on impediments.
profile_positions.title: Agile Test Lead and Technical Test Analyst via Cognizant

profile_positions.description: Worked in a chain test assignments for various product based local bank (JAVA) applications following Agile (Scrum) Build/Standard chain test process. Responsibilities are setting up test strategy together with test manager and third parties, perform integration test and chain test in every quarterly releases of the project. Administrated the test cases, defects in HP ALM. Supported PAT, aftercare and production incidents of the project. End of every release shared the results, outstanding issues and followed up on approvals to all needed stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Technical Test Analyst via Cognizant

profile_positions.description: Worked in a test assignment for application following Agile (Scrum) process.  Responsibilities are performing system test and automate (Fitnesse) application in every two weeks of sprint. Administrated the  defects in JIRA. Supported performance test. End of every sprint shared the results, outstanding issues and followed up on approvals to all the stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Analyst via Cognizant

profile_positions.description: Placed into the existing team to test SEPA & Statement sys (Tandem) projects following T-Map/Waterfall methodology.  Tasks were create test plan, PRA analysis, RTM creation, perform system test (Create Logical & Physical scenarios and execute) and regression. Administrated the test cases, defects in HP ALM. Supported Chain test, PAT, Load test and production incidents of the project. End of every release share the results, deliverables and test artifact’s to customer.
profile_positions.title: Module Test Lead and Senior Test Analyst

profile_positions.description: Worked with the existing team to lead and test SEPA and statement (Tandem) project following T-Map/Waterfall methodology in Onsite/Offshore model.  Tasks were coordinating with offshore team and work together to accomplish test activities and deliverables including create test plan, PRA analysis, RTM creation, perform system test, regression test, UAT in the project. Administrated project and registered findings in HP QC. Supported PAT, Load test and production incidents of the project. End of every release shared the results and deliverables to customer.
profile_positions.title: Technical Test Analyst via Cognizant

profile_positions.description: Assignment to create regression set for Payment and statement applications following T-Map/Waterfall methodology in Onsite/Offshore model. Responsibilities were to understand the payment landscape and create the regression set, execute and create RTM. Later, responsibilities were extended to multiple projects to test the maintenance RFC’s and also added up to statement system. Worked on complete test life cycle of the project. Administrated defect and design in HP QC.
